item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:

11. The "email is authentication" pattern (139 points | 191 comments)

29. Four Thieves Vinegar Collective – Harm Reduction for the Living (187 points | 144 comments)
